title: Riginac111
author: Riginac111
content: Please I'm new here and i don't know the necessary things i will do, i have read something's here but it's not enough to say i know anything, with your description I will coup with you guys

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: Welcome to the forum mate. It will be quite hard to help you if you don’t state what your problem is. First I will ask you to read through the pinned posts on this board (beginners & Help)  and then if there is anything you still have questions about you can go on and ask. Although to avoid having to repeat some questions that have already been attended to it is best you make use of the search button first before making any thread. Once you cannot find the answers to your questions then you can go ahead to create a thread on them. Read through this threadAlso there are rules guiding the forum so I would advise you take a look at some here.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: The rate of new here threads we are having now is seriously alarming to me. Welcome to the forum, mate.  What type of posts should a newbie post? Check out this recent thread created by a newbie. I believe you will get everything that you need there since there are a lot of recommendations from different members and links shared.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Welcome onboard OP, this platform is a big platform with local boards ie different countries have their boards here too which you can check and see if your country local board is very much active for you to communicate there. As you can see for yourself, there are lots of boards and each o them have a pinned post just as this thread havee at the top. It is there do that everyone can see it and read so stop guide them through.I think this can help you OP; https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.msg7955645#msg7955645https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2534500.msg25841174#msg25841174https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1689727.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5275357.0

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Welcome to the forum! The forum is dedicated to Bitcoin, go through all the boards and read the rules pinned at the top of every page. If you have any questions you can create a topic on this board and we will try to help you. In the meantime, you click on those links shared by CryptSafe and go through them. You might find your local board if you go to the home page and scroll down.

comments.author: Liliana1304
comments.body: The "I'm new here" threads are becoming a norm and it's looking like every newbie has to do it to indicate newness. I think your rank speaks volumes enough so instead of following the trend, it's best to just go through the rules that are written on the tops of some of the boards.Welcome, dude. Just ensure to abide by the rules, try not to plagiarize and have a lot of patience to not be swayed when things seem to not go your way or when you're hit with both constructive and destructive criticism and you are good to go.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: I will tell you a technique which you can follow and this might be helpful for many users on this forum.Open google.com, in the search type site:bitcointalk.org {your question}This technique allows you to find all the questions you might wanna ask on this forum, and this will show results in the Google Search making it much easier for you to find anything.Other than that, do not use AI based tools to write crap and copy paste someone's work. Good Luck!

comments.author: Kalam001
comments.body: Quote from: Riginac111 on June 22, 2023, 09:05:32 AMPlease I'm new here and i don't know the necessary things i will do, i have read something's here but it's not enough to say i know anything, with your description I will coup with you guys You are really welcome to the forum. I am not particularly familiar with the forum, but I have been there for a while and have encountered a few things, so I suppose I can provide some brief advice:1. Begin by reading the forum's rules and guidelines.2. Avoid spamming because it is prohibited here and will result in an immediate ban.3. Make an effort to write your own posts rather than copying and pasting those of others.4. Feel free to comment or ask questions about any post you find interesting.5. Conduct thorough research to gain merit.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: Riginac111 on June 22, 2023, 09:05:32 AMPlease I'm new here and i don't know the necessary things i will do, i have read something's here but it's not enough to say i know anything, with your description I will coup with you guys OP I'd thought about giving you some links but i see some already given to you, but i will give you a quick summary of most of them, try to learn how to develop a reading culture or habit as you may call it, be active on the forum, go through the links provided to you, read and make sure you understand the forum's rules and regulations, do not plagiarize, do not post off topics, learn to make a quality post, always use the forum search engine to research on already discussed topics, learn to be adaptive, don't be too forward and accept corrections, lastly learn about bitcoin and understand how the forum operates in general.Welcome onboard.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: Quote from: Riginac111 on June 22, 2023, 09:05:32 AMPlease I'm new here and i don't know the necessary things i will do, i have read something's here but it's not enough to say i know anything, with your description I will coup with you guys Are you also new to Bitcoin or Cryptocurrency? If it's than you must have learn about Bitcoin and how it works. Then study about other cryptocurrencies and Blockchain technologies.I hope you are quite known about digital currency and that's why you are here. So first thing is for you to maintain is forum rules. Read them to know more details about the rules1. Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQ2. Newbies - Read before postingThen try to learn from others or if you have any question then you can ask in this board. But it will be good if you use search option to find the specific threads. It's not a good habit to repeat previously discussed topics for many times. The. You can grow your rank by contributing in this forum. You can join Bounties for passive crypto earning and many more. So enjoy the forum and it's features.

comments.author: puloweh555
comments.body: Quote from: Riginac111 on June 22, 2023, 09:05:32 AMPlease I'm new here and i don't know the necessary things i will do, i have read something's here but it's not enough to say i know anything, with your description I will coup with you guys First of all, I would like to welcome you to the bitcointalk forum friend. Above, there are so many other friends who have given you threads that you should read and that you should learn about this forum. But all of that will be in vain if you don't really read and study it properly, I hope you don't just ask but also practice it.Because so many beginners have asked questions like you, they have disappeared, the account has no progress. I just hope that you can feel at home in this forum because what you need to know is that this forum will be very beneficial for yourself, whether you are looking for additional income or trader knowledge and various suitable wallets to look after your assets in the future. The most important thing is don't be lazy to read all the threads because all of them are very useful for you.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: You have entered the forum. You have come to the section for beginners. Furthermore, you are writing something that you have not read enough to understand. What do you want to hear next?If you need advice, you should read all the links above and be more collected, because of course there is a lot of information. Do not rush to read a lot at once; as you read, if you do not find the answer, start asking.For most questions from newbies, there are many of the same answers, but you must understand that there is no simple formula to quickly shove all the information into your head.It all depends on your level of understanding. If you are too preoccupied and need to increase your attention level, start taking nootropics and vitamins.You must understand that much depends on you. It is necessary to become independent and understand that it is not the forum that needs you, but you need the forum if you decide to become a member of the community.

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: Quote from: Riginac111 on June 22, 2023, 09:05:32 AMPlease I'm new here and i don't know the necessary things i will do, i have read something's here but it's not enough to say i know anything, with your description I will coup with you guys It is always exciting to welcome new members to the community. I recall that when I first joined the forum, I was even afraid to post, but I eventually realized that it was all about interaction. Reading some topics makes me laugh and brightens my day. However, in order to fully enjoy your time here, you must follow the rules. I have seen some members share links to relevant threads. If you break the rules, then be prepared to deal with the repercussions. One thing that is especially crucial was the fact that initially believed the forum was too challenging for me, but over time, I began to appreciate it and am still enjoying it.

comments.author: Shamm
comments.body: Quote from: Riginac111 on June 22, 2023, 09:05:32 AMPlease I'm new here and i don't know the necessary things i will do, i have read something's here but it's not enough to say i know anything, with your description I will coup with you guys Op you are very welcome to this community,       If you are here in the community because you want to learn something good about Bitcoin and other cryptocurrency then one thing I assure and I say that you are in the right place because this community talked about more in Bitcoin and in other cryptocurrency which is you can learn a lot of things. But first as you are a newcomer here in our community you must read the rules and regulations first on this forum and you must obey with that. And after reading and understanding the rules and regulations then you can use the search button in order to read the topic what you want to know.Op good luck on your journey here in our community.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Nothing to worry about your confusion. Take your time to go through most of those threads you have read before opening this thread and also read the new links sent to you. You are not the first to experience such confusion but with time on the forum,you shall pass through it if you are determined to see it through. I welcome you to the forum.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: You have been provided with some useful links above so just go through them if you want to get idea about how forum works or what are set of rules to follow.I would say just be orginal in your ideas as this is discussion forum open to all and gain knowledge by exploring different threads as we have many boards for each category so you can share your ideas or just look at ongoing discussions in them.The simple advice I would give you is that you will also come to know about merits and campaign with time but don't rush to earn because that's the mistake most newbies make as they want to earn merits to take part in these campaigns where they indulge themselves in plagiarism which will not help you but get you banned so avoid doing it.If you gain knowledge first it will automatically boost up your post quality and merits will be delivered.Best of luck for future forum journey and hope to see you grow here.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Well one confusion, is that many newbies here wants to have everything at once, you can't just come into the forum and expect that you would learn everything you want to learn here all at once.As a newcomer take your time, don't just come into the forum and put pressure on yourself in any way, or feel the forum demands anything from you all at once, and I can actually blame the vision of earning many newbies had before joining. Learning is a process and it takes time according to the individual newbie.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: Riginac111 on June 22, 2023, 09:05:32 AMPlease I'm new here and i don't know the necessary things i will do, i have read something's here but it's not enough to say i know anything, with your description I will coup with you guys Yo, warm welcome to the forum! It is not being mentioned a lot, but reading the Help menu will give you great overview about the structure of the forum. Do not forget to read the forum rules pinned from the Meta board.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: Welcome to the forum. You have located the beginners and help section feel free to read through the thread of other members so you can get some information and knowledge from the comments of members who knows if the right answer to what you want to know will be found there.You have to also understand that it takes determination to achieve anything in life so you need to get use to the forum by giving out your time to learn from the post of members here and remember to make verification through personal research I believe it will help you to get proper information and knowledge of learning is your notion of being here, congrats on locating this place.
